title: how sad is this league of legend community
body: so i was just in a game this guy telling me and some other people to hang them self just because he is losing a game i have lost some friend over some bullies who told him to hurt him self and dont want this to happen to anyone just because some random person told them this really sadden me league community

replies.body: Hey, I feel you buddy I really do. If you ever see this kind of behavior again please don't hesitate to smash that report button in the post game lobby. If this continues outside of them game or game lobby, grab some screenshots and shoot them to our player behavior team in a ticket.
